Name: Deathlands
About the game: Deathlands is a multiplayer turn-based survival game where you fight other players to remain the last man standing. If you only play one turn-based game, make it this one, because you'll love it! Features Easy to learn tutorial! Singleplayer! Multiplayer! Lot's of pixels! Low system requirements, perfect for your laptop, you could even run it on a potato! You can play with people from other continents without worrying about lag because it's turn-based! A few minor bugs but don't worry, 50% of the time it works every time!
Meta Title: Deathlands: Nov 24, 2017, Frost Studios and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Deathlands? Check out the release date (Nov 24, 2017), developer insights from Frost Studios, and a complete game summary.
